Richmond Adelaide Centre:
- Opened in new location in January 2009
- Located on mezzanine level of a building within the Richmond Adelaide Complex
- Manager: Laura Alexopoulos, Email: lmaddale@georgebrown.ca
- Centre Phone number: 416-415-2453
- Address: 130 Adelaide Street West, Mezzanine Level, Toronto ON, M5H 3P5
- Accommodates age groups from 6 weeks to 5 years
- Hours of operation: 8 a.m. - 5:30 p.m.
- Catered by "Yummy Catering"
- Collaboration with Oxford Properties (second workplace centre)
- Model lab school for the School of Early Childhood
- Provides training ground for college students
- Follows guidelines from Toronto Childrenâ€™s Services in CWELCC program implementation
- No additional fees for extracurricular activities or transportation
- Children under 6 years old eligible for fee reduction
- Waitlist sign up available
- Contact George Brown College for fee information and verification (416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca)
- Social Media Hub available

The text does not contain any factual information related to the specific programs offered by the college.
